product_name: Bear Grylls Self-Inflating Sleeping Pad - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Tired of rolling off your narrow pad or waking up feeling like you're lying on concrete? The wide, cushy Bear Grylls Self-Inflating Sleeping Pad solves these problems to ensure a good night's sleep.
short_description: Tired of rolling off your narrow pad or waking up feeling like you're lying on concrete? The wide, cushy Bear Grylls Self-Inflating Sleeping Pad solves these problems to ensure a good night's sleep.
